EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.Intelligent.Services.N.G.N.18224.TBC (Nurture 2).Email 1A
EmailTemplate.subject: Slash the cost of deploying GPON
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Faster, cheaper GPON deployments Automate your ONT activation to reduce time-to-market and costs.
The most challenging aspect of provisioning GPON services is the installation and activation of the optical network terminals. But the Nokia ONT Easy Start solution significantly reduces truck rolls, technician time and manual processes. Which saves you time and money.
Read our white paper to learn more. Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
